About.title: About Me
About.name: Takumi Mizuno
About.description1: Web Application Engineer with experience in backend development and SRE at SI companies and Toyota Motor Corporation. Currently working on frontend development for AI text editors at a startup company.
About.description2: Responsible for a wide range of development processes including client negotiation, requirements definition, design, implementation, and testing. Specialized in client communication, requirements definition, and application architecture (DDD, Microservices, etc.).
